content: This famous Italian artist painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City. Who is he?

I believe you're referring to Michelangelo Buonarroti, often simply known as Michelangelo. He was a renowned Italian artist of the Renaissance period, celebrated for his contributions to painting, sculpture, architecture, and poetry. Among his most iconic works is the fresco on the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City, which he completed between 1508 and 1512. This masterpiece features numerous scenes from the Book of Genesis, including the famous depiction of Adam reaching out to God's finger. Michelangelo's work on the Sistine Chapel ceiling is considered one of the greatest achievements in the history of art.
